title: TRADE 1: Nifty Call Buying
logic: Nifty is currently trading near 24876.95. The 25050 CE, with LTP of 60.6, shows potential upside if Nifty continues its momentum, making it a suitable buy candidate with a defined risk.

title: TRADE 2: BankNifty Call Buying
logic: BankNifty is trading at 55734.9. The 57500 CE has a LTP of 38.85. If BankNifty continues uptrend, this call option can provide good returns.

title: TRADE 3: Nifty Put Buying (Slightly Out of Money)
logic: Nifty is at 24876.95, and 24700 PE is available at 30.6. If Nifty shows weakness, this trade can give decent profit as 24700 is a good support level.
